argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | crefi.x | |- X = U. J |
| 2 |  | crefdf.b | |- B = CovHasRef A |
| 3 |  | crefdf.p | |- ( z e. A -> ph ) |
| 4 | 2 | #P_eleq2i | |- ( J e. B <-> J e. CovHasRef A ) |
| 5 | 1 | #P_crefi | |- ( ( J e. CovHasRef A /\ C C_ J /\ X = U. C ) -> E. z e. ( ~P J i^i A ) z Ref C ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl3an1b | |- ( ( J e. B /\ C C_ J /\ X = U. C ) -> E. z e. ( ~P J i^i A ) z Ref C ) |
| 7 |  | #P_elin | |- ( z e. ( ~P J i^i A ) <-> ( z e. ~P J /\ z e. A ) ) |
| 8 | 3 | #P_anim2i | |- ( ( z e. ~P J /\ z e. A ) -> ( z e. ~P J /\ ph ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_sylbi | |- ( z e. ( ~P J i^i A ) -> ( z e. ~P J /\ ph ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_anim1i | |- ( ( z e. ( ~P J i^i A ) /\ z Ref C ) -> ( ( z e. ~P J /\ ph ) /\ z Ref C ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_anass | |- ( ( ( z e. ~P J /\ ph ) /\ z Ref C ) <-> ( z e. ~P J /\ ( ph /\ z Ref C ) ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_sylib | |- ( ( z e. ( ~P J i^i A ) /\ z Ref C ) -> ( z e. ~P J /\ ( ph /\ z Ref C ) ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_reximi2 | |- ( E. z e. ( ~P J i^i A ) z Ref C -> E. z e. ~P J ( ph /\ z Ref C ) ) |
| 14 | 6, 13 | #P_syl | |- ( ( J e. B /\ C C_ J /\ X = U. C ) -> E. z e. ~P J ( ph /\ z Ref C ) ) |
